## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d69bf54e33d46b564e56a260b65d3c9b8d3a7202dfec0feb06e2930c0bc53dce)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'os-apps-ui-curvelibrary1' @ 12.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
